titles.title: Expressing support for designation of December 3, 2016, as the "National Day of 3D Printing".
Expressing support for designation of December 3, 2016, as the "National Day of 3D Printing".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Supports the designation of a National Day of 3D Printing.
Recognizes the economic impact of 3D printing and its positive implications for the U.S. advanced manufacturing sector.
Encourages the promotion and celebration of 3D printing technology.
